version_description:
- GameCenter authorization fix
- Balance improvment
- Network optimization
- UI cosmetics and other minior fixes

Game was made available around the World
Added set of iMessage stickers
Changed item prices
Improved game optimization

- Payments problem fix
- Achievements​
- Optimizations on slow devices

What's New in Version 1.20 (iOS):
- New equippable items (boots, gloves, etc.)
- New weapons
- A new map
- A brand new Duel Mode
- Added the purchase history feature
- Price changes for items and gold
- Enhanced clan functionality
- Added a new mid-combat player matchmaking system
- Video capture functionality available

-optimization improvements
-bug fixes

- Personal skills!
- New machinegun: PKM!
- Infra-red vision mask!
- New offers and sales.
- New map!
- Updated leaderboards.

- New map Brooklyn
- New mode Fortress Defence
- New mode AWP
- New sniper rifle (for credits)
- New Year items
- New character models
- Reworked maps
- New background sounds for maps
- New Clan management and search panel
- Clan Skills
- Clan Bank
- New Clan chat
- Game and UI optimization
- New Main menu and shop UI
- Numerous fixes and changes

- New shotgun "Spirit of War"
- New assault rifle AR15
- Laser mines!
- Automated weapon upgrades.
- Bug fixes

Welcome, sodiler! A vast pack of changes awaits you:

A lot of changes with new update!
- You can now wield any weapon instead of pistol
- Vast graphics changes: models, user interface, lightning etc.
- Change weapon switch controller
- Added players health bars
- New map "Blackwood pines"
- New rewards for ads watching
- Shooting-through-glass system
- Bug fixes and optimization
- Rewards for leaderborad places
- Vast changes in weapon, equiment and abilities balance
- Level cap has been increase by 90
- XM25 grenade launcher has been powered up

Good luck!
Welcome, soldier! This is a fast hotfix with bugfixing and optimization due to domain flag day)

- Personal skills!
- New machinegun: PKM!
- Infra-red vision mask!
- New offers and sales.
- New map!
- Updated leaderboards.

Welcome, sodiler! A vast pack of changes awaits you:

A lot of changes with new update!
- You can now wield any weapon instead of pistol
- Vast graphics changes: models, user interface, lightning etc.
- Change weapon switch controller
- Added players health bars
- New map "Blackwood pines"
- New rewards for ads watching
- Shooting-through-glass system
- Bug fixes and optimization
- Rewards for leaderborad places
- Vast changes in weapon, equiment and abilities balance
- Level cap has been increase by 90
- XM25 grenade launcher has been powered up

Good luck!
Welcome, soldier! This is a fast hotfix with bugfixing and optimization due to domain flag day)

- New shotgun "Spirit of War"
- New assault rifle AR15
- Laser mines!
- Automated weapon upgrades.
- Bug fixes

A vast update awaits you!

Squad combat! Now you can join your friends as a squad and fight together!
New "Capture Points" mode! Fight to be the first to capture territories!
XM556 Microgun prototype! Unreal firepower in a soldier's hands!
Animation, graphics and UI changes.
Numerous bug and crash fixes.

Ad rewards logic changed
Resource loading logic changed
New Promos tab added in the shop
New Rewards tab added in shop
Night vision and Heat vision fixed
Tons of visual UI improvements"
Added battle crossbow PSE with explosive arrows
Explosion damage resistance is now restricted by 70%. Grenade launchers rules!
Added DSR Mk2 sniper rifle
Tunisia and Blackwood Pines are returned!
Added three masks: Yellow Smile, Red Skull and Flame

A vast update awaits you!

Squad combat! Now you can join your friends as a squad and fight together!
New "Capture Points" mode! Fight to be the first to capture territories!
XM556 Microgun prototype! Unreal firepower in a soldier's hands!
Animation, graphics and UI changes.
Numerous bug and crash fixes.

Marry Christmas and Happy New Year!
- First season of the Battle Pass started: winter soldier skin, arctic L96, liquid nitrogen bomb, "Icicle" knife and much more!
- Fortress defence mode is returning!
- New weapon HK416 Winter Forest
- Fast knife attack added!
- Renewed Wastelands map!
- Added new first person effects: Freeze Effect and Bloody Eyes
- Visual changes in user interface
- Many fixes and optimization

Third battlepass season!

- Two new skins: russian riot policeman and beautiful female S.W.A.T.
- New weapons: Pancor Jackhammer, MP5-K
- New helmet: FCH
- New map: Havana
- Added enemy targets enlightment
- Now you can switch your current weapon on previous just tapping switch weapon button
- Fixed autoswitching graphics bug: now if you change it in the settings menu it will be saved

Start of the 5th Battle Pass season!

- Two new skins: American Sniper and US special forces "Cowboy"
- Unique weapon - Hand-Held Flamethrower!
- New items: Delta Officer Helmet, Tactical Goggles, AN-M14 Grenade
- Unique content - USA Mask and Flag series Colt 1911
- In-game mail added
- Revamped quests and contracts windows
- PSE and XM25 bugs fixed
- 10 new levels added
- Matchmaking system and battle stability improvements

- New weapon IMBEL .308 AGL with unique Wilds camouflage and the Rainbow Kerambit
- New headwear: DEVTAC Ronin bulletproof mask
- New map — Afghanistan
- Anticheat updated

- Battle Pass Season 6 has begun!
- Two new skins: BOPE and Undercover Agent
- New weapon IMBEL .308 AGL with unique Wilds camouflage and the Rainbow Kerambit
- New headwear: DEVTAC Ronin bulletproof mask
- Unique season 6 content - Ordem e Progresso, PRO-X CAMO, Scorpion EVO, and Mekanika URU Jungle weapon
- New armor set added for level 40
- Voice chat added
- New map — Afghanistan
- Anticheat updated

- Battle Pass Season 6 has begun!
- Two new skins: BOPE and Undercover Agent
- New weapon IMBEL .308 AGL with unique Wilds camouflage and the Rainbow Kerambit
- New headwear: DEVTAC Ronin bulletproof mask
- Unique season 6 content - Ordem e Progresso, PRO-X CAMO, Scorpion EVO, and Mekanika URU Jungle weapon
- New armor set added for level 40
- Voice chat added
- New map — Afghanistan
- Anticheat updated

New Battle Pass season:
- SPAS-12 Survivor Edition shotgun
- AK-5 Biohazard assault rifle
- Survivor Club
- Survivor skin
- Infected skin
- NM-1 Hornet mask
- Infected mask
- IWI X95 assault rifle
- clan channel added for voice chat
- game optimization
- minor errors fixed

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

Season 8 has some cool changes in store:

New weapons: Remington MS, M16A2, Northern Axe.
New character - Northern Warrior.
New legendary skins for weapons with unique finishings.
Blueprints. Now you can make several weapons using them.
New mode!
A new chest system where they're easier to get.
Santa outfit and more.
Squad upgrades, new quests, achievements and more.

Season 9 has some cool new changes ready for you:

- New weapons: Beretta M12, Origin-12
- New character - Ghost
- Special new skins for starting weapons: Scar-L, Scout, MP133, UZI
- Bot behavior fixes
- Now you can log in via Facebook
- Visual map changes: Training Base
- Lots of technical fixes and upgrades
